paper_abstract: In the last few years, live pay-TV system via the Internet has come to be established with the development of broadband network. To develop such a system, a mechanism for content protection is required. In this paper, a new architecture integrating fingerprint with cryptosystem is proposed to protect digital contents (image and video) from unauthorized viewing and illegal redistribution. Then, a scheme integrating anti-collusion code and Home Page public-key cryptosystem (PKC) is described. Such a scheme is shown feasible and realistic for implementing with respect to computation/transmission cost. Copyright (C) 2008 John Wiley & Sons, Ltd.
paper_title: Integrating fingerprint with cryptosystem for internet-based live pay-TV system
